# channel.list

返回团队内的讨论组列表，获取某个讨论组的完整信息，请使用 `channel.info`.

## 请求方式

```
GET {base_url}/channel.list
```

## 请求参数

**需要登录**


## 响应

### 200

```javascript
[
  {
    "private": false,
    "general": true,
    "latest_ts": 1486367046281,
    "uid": "=bw52O",
    "name": "所有人",
    "is_member": false,
    "is_active": true,
    "type": "normal",
    "topic": null,
    "member_uids": [
      "=bw52O"
    ],
    "vchannel_id": "=bw52O",
    "id": "=bw52O",
    "team_id": "=bw52O"
  }
]
```
### 错误响应

```javascript
{
  "code": // error code,
  "error": "unexpected error"
}
```
